field.label: Enabled
field.comment: States if this module is enabled.

field.label: Update group on customer save
field.comment: The Dealer4Dealer Price List module will update the customer group of a customer, based on the Price List and VAT Class. If you want to manually add customers to xCore Price List customer groups, set this setting to 'No'. Make sure the setting to create 'empty' groups in the Cron Configuration is set to 'Yes' when this setting is disabled. Otherwise, no xCore Price List groups will be available.

field.label: Default customer group (DEPRECATED)
field.comment: This settings has been deprecated and doesn't do anything anymore.

field.label: Run cron on new customer group
field.comment: When a customer is synchronised and the combination of the Price List and VAT Class hasn't been used before, a new customer group will be created. Unless the setting to create 'empty' groups is turned on, no Tier Prices will exist for the new customer group. Set this setting to 'Yes' to run the cron, which will create Tier Prices for the new group.

field.label: Create 'empty' groups for all Price Lists
field.comment: For each Price List, multiple customer groups can exist, based on the VAT Class of the customer. If this setting is set to 'Yes', it will create groups even if there aren't any customers belonging to that group. This will result in Tier Prices being created for these groups. As soon as a customer is added to the groups, the Tier Prices will be in place.

field.label: Maximum amount of items to process every run. (Default is 5000 per hour)
field.comment: By default the cron job runs every hour and will process 2500 price list items to tier prices. Increasing this number might result in higher memory usage causing out-of-memory issues.
